programme.desc: Humdinger, Sid, and Sweetie have joined forces to try and take over the Lookout.

programme.desc: Hefty decides to take Timid under his wing and teach him some self-confidence.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: When Daddy Pig receives a letter saying that he must go away on business, Peppa, Mummy and George go along too.

programme.desc: Mill Street Bistro Part 2: In the conclusion to the Mill Street Bistro saga, Gordon's disagreement with the proprietor erupts into one of his most intense confrontations.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Worst Grinch Ever: Under pressure from their parents, Erica and Geoff must decide how to celebrate the holidays. And Adam learns that Brea has a new boyfriend.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Blade Runner: The Musical: Geoff and the JTP try to find a common connection while Adam directs the school play, and realises that dreams do come true.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Day We Almost Died: A near miss from a crash leaves everyone in the car either on edge or adopting a new 'live for the moment' mentality.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Big Guns: Claire's fury about the ugly boat on neighbours Ronnie and Amber's front lawn soon develops into all-out war.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sheep.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Amy's Baking Company: At Amy's Baking Company in Scottsdale, Arizona, Gordon Ramsay meets a husband and wife team with a shocking contempt for customer feedback.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Return to Amy's Baking Company: Gordon revisits the most contentious restaurant he's ever tried to rescue - Amy's Baking Company, in Scottsdale, Arizona.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: No Loan Again, Naturally: When Homer and Marge's mortgage rate skyrockets, they have to put their house up for sale - and Flanders buys it and becomes their landlord.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gone Maggie Gone: When Marge is temporarily blinded, Homer loses Maggie to a convent and Lisa has to go undercover as a nun to find her.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Memoir: Jim Parsons and Mayim Bialik reprise their roles as Sheldon Cooper and Amy Farrah Fowler in the last ever episode of Young Sheldon.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Pilot: The first ever episode of the prequel to The Big Bang Theory. Gifted nine-year-old Sheldon Cooper doesn't find it easy growing up in East Texas.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Sex, Lies, and Kickball: Jay's best friend, Shorty, returns from Costa Rica and stays at the house so that they can reconnect. And Alex is ready to shed her good-girl image.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: It's the Great Pumpkin, Phil Dunphy: Phil and Claire want to celebrate Halloween in a big way, but no one else seems to share their enthusiasm for it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tam Turbulence: When Sheldon won't tell anyone why he's never mentioned Tam, his childhood best friend, Leonard tries to find out more.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Planetarium Collision: Sheldon accidentally sabotages Amy's career. Raj isn't keen when Howard's invited to host a show with him at the planetarium.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Imitation Perturbation: Howard dresses up as Sheldon for Halloween, so Sheldon gets revenge. Leonard is shocked that Penny can't recall their first kiss.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Grant Allocation Derivation: Leonard is made responsible for distributing extra grant money. Bernadette turns the garden playhouse into a hideaway to escape her family.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: 48 Hours: Peralta jumps the gun and makes an arrest without enough evidence, leaving himself only 48 hours to collect the proof he needs before the suspect is released.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Old School: Peralta is overjoyed when his hero, crime reporter Jimmy Brogan, visits the precinct, but things soon go awry. Jeffords and Boyle prepare Diaz for a day in court.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart Stops to Smell the Roosevelts: Superintendent Chalmers' unconventional approach to teaching Bart about US history sparks a fascination with President Teddy Roosevelt.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Replaceable You: When Homer loses his job to his eager new assistant, he teams up with Ned to reveal her evil past.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pilot: The first ever episode of the hit sitcom. Leonard and Sheldon's geeky world is shaken up by the arrival of a beautiful new neighbour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Big Bran Hypothesis: Sheldon sneaks into Penny's flat to tidy it. She's not happy about it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fuzzyboots Corollary: Leonard is upset when he discovers that Penny is seeing someone, so he plucks up the courage to ask a woman out on a date.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Luminous Fish Effect: Getting fired forces Sheldon to ponder life outside physics, so Leonard has to take drastic action to snap his friend out of his reverie.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr. Lisa's Opus: In her Harvard application, 18-year-old Lisa recounts the story of her childhood - including the time when Marge planned to leave Homer...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gone Boy: Bart falls into an old top-secret underground military installation in the woods.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: 'Scuse Me While I Miss the Sky: Lisa petitions Mayor Quimby to end Springfield's light pollution problem, which leads to unexpected problems...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grade School Confidential: Principal Skinner and Mrs Krabappel embark on a torrid affair but have to bribe Bart to keep the whole thing a secret.

programme.title: New: Below Deck
programme.desc: Brand new series - Disappointing Daddy: Barbie must decide whether to honour her family's expectations or follow her heart with Kyle. Chef Nick gets some unexpected pushback.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the 'box this time: Squid Game: The Challenge, I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, The Crown, Deal or No Deal, Planet Earth III, Made in Chelsea and Saving Lives at Sea.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Tory Jessie is far from conservative when it comes to talking about sex and politics. How will she get on with journalist Josh? Ex-roadie Winston meets glam gran Donna.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: (2022) Romcom with Julia Roberts and George Clooney. A staggeringly beautiful, divorced couple reunite to stop their daughter's wedding in the staggeringly beautiful surroundings of Bali.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: (2010) Comedy sequel with Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller and Jessica Alba. Can Greg Focker live up to nightmare dad-in-law Jack's newfound reluctant sort-of respect?

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: (1987) Sci-fi thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. A US commando unit gets trapped in the jungle by a murderous, seemingly invincible alien hunter. But they ain't got time to bleed.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: (1982) John Huston's adaptation of the Broadway musical about a plucky young orphan who longs for a happier future, starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: (1994) Kicking family action sequel. Hilary Swank takes on the karate kid soubriquet, as the venerable Mr Miyagi helps her to battle her teenage demons.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the...
programme.desc: ...Fallen: (2009) Raucous sci-fi action sequel with Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox. Can Sam and Mikaela prevent the scourge of the Decepticon robots from destroying the Earth?

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly comic sci-fi action thriller with Michelle Yeoh. A laundromat owner's drab existence becomes much more exciting when she must traverse the multiverse to defeat an evil force.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: (2013) All-American action thriller starring Channing Tatum and Jamie Foxx. A Capitol police officer steps up to protect the President when the White House is compromised.

programme.title: Shiva Baby
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy-drama. A college student struggles to keep a lid on her secrets as she awkwardly encounters her sugar daddy and the ex-girlfriend she's still hung up on at a shiva.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Mousehunt
programme.desc: (1997) Raucous comedy. Two brothers go to immense lengths to try to rid their mansion of a mouse. The mouse goes to immense lengths to rid its mansion of the two brothers. Who will win?

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: Daleks Invasion Earth 2150 A.D.
programme.desc: (1966) A sci-fi classic with Peter Cushing. Dr Who travels to the future only to find the Daleks have conquered the Earth! Can he stop them nuking the planet's core? With Bernard Cribbins.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: (2009) JJ Abrams's sci-fi adventure reboot, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana. A vengeful time traveller targets Kirk and Spock on their first mission.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: (2022) Daisy Edgar-Jones stars in director Olivia Newman's adaptation of Delia Owens' best-selling novel about a feral child who's accused of murder in America's Deep South. Did she do it?

programme.title: Broker
programme.desc: (2022) Hirokazu Kore-eda's darkly-comic road-trip crime drama about two friends who exploit a church scheme to sell unwanted babies to the childless. With Song Kang-ho. In Korean/subs.

programme.title: One for the Road
programme.desc: (2002) Four drunk-drivers, including Hwyel Bennett and Rupert Proctor, find their lives intertwine at the rehab clinic they're ordered to attend. Very strong language.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the...
programme.desc: ...Curse of the Mummy: (2022) Animated family adventure. After Tad accidentally unleashes a curse - doh! - he and his friends must find the Emerald Tablet to save the world.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1997) Animated drama. When the Russian royal family is murdered, the sole surviving child is separated from her grandmother. Years later, conmen try to exploit the reward for her return.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: First Men in the Moon
programme.desc: (1964) Sci-fi starring Lionel Jeffries. An eccentric Victorian inventor builds the first spacecraft to land on the moon, which is inhabited by ant-like beings - animated by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: (1995) Swashbuckling adventure. Geena Davis and Matthew Modine star as pirates racing to find the missing parts of their treasure map and beat an evil rival (Frank Langella) to the booty.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: (2021) Sci-fi action. Mark Wahlberg discovers that his hallucinations are memories from past lives. There are others like him, but they don't all have good intentions...

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: The Dingles are divided, while April is reunited with Dylan, and Robert's suspicions worry John

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Creed
programme.desc: Boxing drama starring Michael B Jordan and Sylvester Stallone. Life comes full circle for former heavyweight champion Rocky Balboa when he's called upon to mentor and train a hungry new fighter - the son of his old adversary Apollo Creed.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: In 1997, 14-year-old Reena Virk attends a party on a quiet island in British Columbia in Canada, and never returns home. Reena's disappearance intrigues a novelist who has returned to her home town, and finds herself drawn into the hidden world of the teenage suspects. Drama, starring Riley Keough

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Ninja Warrior UK
programme.desc: Competitors from across the nation test their strength, speed and courage in the semi-final of the obstacle-course challenge, hosted by Ben Shephard, Rochelle Humes and Chris Kamara. Those who make it to the end of the adrenaline-fuelled mission face one final task - scaling the heights of a tower named Mount Midoriyama - as they battle it out for the title of Ninja Warrior UK. With brand new obstacles to face, the course is more extreme than ever, as the best competitors from four heats return to fight it out for a place in the final

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: John digs up dirt on Robert, while Cain goes on the warpath and Dylan stands up April

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Theo's anger erupts in front of his family when Todd drops a bombshell, Carl distances himself from Abi, Sam opens up to Toyah, and a job offer prompts James to pack his bags

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of a woman's quest to discover her identity, and another searching for the sister she always wanted. Paula Stillie has always looked completely different from her white adoptive family in Scotland and her search for her birth family leads across the globe, while Lisa Harding tries to fulfil her mother's dying wish and find the older sister who was given up for adoption before Lisa was born

programme.title: ITV News at Ten

programme.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Roger Moore and Christopher Lee. James Bond goes in search of a solar-energy device stolen by professional killer Scaramanga - a hitman who carries out his million-dollar assignments with a golden gun.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Cam is thrown by a shocking discovery, the police rush to unravel what really happened under the bridge, Josephine makes a deal with Rebecca, and a look into the past reveals Reena's first rebellion

programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig as agent James Bond.
